actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that absentee voting ballots cast in elections for public office may be mailed free of postage.

summary.text: Provides that except for mail matter transmitted under the Federal Voting Assistance Act of 1955, any individual casting an absentee ballot in any election may return such ballot postage-free to the appropriate State or local election authority.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that absentee voting ballots cast in elections for public office may be mailed free of postage.
